sen.j: 闘鶏国造（つげのくにのみやつこ・つげこくぞう)は大和国北東部を支配した国造。
sen.e: Tsuge no Kuni no Miyatsuko (闘鶏国造) was a Kuni no miyatsuko (the head of a local government) who ruled the nothern-east of Yamato Province.
Tsuge no Kuni no Miyatsuko (also called 'Tsuge Kokuzo') was a Kuni no miyatsuko (the head of a local government) who ruled the northern-east of Yamato Province.
sen.cmt: (闘鶏国造) 漢字表記が言及されているということではないので、漢字表記を訳に残す必要はないので削除しました。名前の読みに二つあり、一つ訳出されていなかったので、(also called 'Tsuge Kokuzo')と追加しました。nothern→スペルミスです。northern
sen.e: Tsuge no Kuni no Miyatsuko (also called 'Tsuge Kokuzo') was a Kuni no miyatsuko (the head of a local government) who ruled the northern-east of Yamato Province.

sen.j: 都祁国造・都下国造とも。
sen.e: Also written as 都祁国造 or 都下国造.
Also written as "都祁国造" or "都下国造".
sen.cmt: 漢字表記の箇所に" "を加えました。
sen.e: Also written as "都祁国造" or "都下国造".
Kamu Yai Mimi no Mikoto
Kamu Yai Mimi no Mikoto
Kamu Yai Mimi no Mikoto

sen.j: 神武天皇の皇子で、綏靖天皇の兄。
sen.e: The prince of Emperor Jimu and elder brother of Emperor Suizei.
He was the prince of Emperor Jinmu and older brother of Emperor Suizei.
sen.cmt: 文章になっていません。He was を加えました。Jimu→Jinmuに修正しました。用語統一リストより、elder brother→older brotherに変更しました。
sen.e: He was the prince of Emperor Jinmu and older brother of Emperor Suizei.

sen.j: 弟に皇位を譲り、神祇の奉祭者となった。
sen.e: He abdicated the throne to his younger brother and became in charge of worship for gods of heaven and earth.
He abdicated the throne to his younger brother and took charge of worship for the gods of heaven and earth.
sen.cmt: became in charge of worship 自然な文章ではないので→に変更しました。gods→the godsに修正しました。
sen.e: He abdicated the throne to his younger brother and took charge of worship for the gods of heaven and earth.
The clan of Tsuge.
The clan was Tsuge.
sen.cmt: The clan of Tsuge→The clan was Tsuge.に変更しました。
sen.e: The clan was Tsuge.

sen.j: 姓は直だが、允恭朝に忍坂大中姫皇后に不敬があったため、稲置姓に落とされた。
sen.e: His surname was Atai, but in the Ingyo period, he was accused of lese majeste against Oshisaka no Onakatsu no Hime no Mikoto, so his surname was demoted to Inagi.
His surname was Atai, however, he took on irreverent behavior toward Empress Oshisaka no Onakatsu no Hime no Mikoto during the Emperor Ingyo's era, and therefore his surname was demoted to Inagi.
sen.cmt: 文章全体に口語的な接続詞が使われていたことと、自然な流れではなかったので全体を見直しました。lese majesteは不敬罪という罪名に当たるので、ここでは不適切です。皇后にあたる箇所が訳漏れです。 Ingyo period→Emperor Ingyo's eraに変更しました。
sen.e: His surname was Atai, however, he took on irreverent behavior toward Empress Oshisaka no Onakatsu no Hime no Mikoto during the Emperor Ingyo's era, and therefore his surname was demoted to Inagi.
Tsuge of Yamabe County, Yamato Province.
Tsuge clan was located in Tsuge in Yamabe County, Yamato Province.
sen.cmt: Tsuge clan was located inを追加しました。of→inに修正しました。
sen.e: Tsuge clan was located in Tsuge in Yamabe County, Yamato Province.

sen.j: 現在の奈良県奈良市の旧都祁村近辺。
sen.e: Today the neighborhood of former Tsuge Village, of Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
The current location is the former Tsuge Village areas in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 文章全体を見直しました。
sen.e: The current location is the former Tsuge Village areas in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: ただし、元の本拠は坐摩神社（大阪市中央区）近辺ともいう。
sen.e: But the original base is also called the neighborhood of Zama-jinja Shrine (Chuo Ward, Osaka City).
However, it is also said that the original home base was Zama-jinja Shrine areas (Chuo Ward, Osaka City).
sen.cmt: 原文の読み違いによる誤訳です。全文を見直しました。But→Howeverに修正しました。base→home baseに変更しました。
sen.e: However, it is also said that the original home base was Zama-jinja Shrine areas (Chuo Ward, Osaka City).

tit.e: The Ujigami (a guardian god or spirit of a particular place in the Shinto religion)
Ujigami (a guardian god or spirit of a particular place in the Shinto religion)
Ujigami (a guardian god or spirit of a particular place in the Shinto religion)

sen.e: Probablly Tsugemikumari-jinja Shrine.
It was probably Tsugemikumari-jinja Shrine.
sen.cmt: It was を追加し、文章になるようにしました。probablly→スペルミスです。probably
sen.e: It was probably Tsugemikumari-jinja Shrine.

sen.j: 祭神は速秋津比古命・大国御魂命または天之水分神・国之水分神。
sen.e: The enshrined deity is Hayaakitsu Hiko no mikoto, Okuni Mitama no Mikoto, or Amenomikumari no Kami, Kuninomikumari no Kami.
The enshrined deities were Haya Akitsuhiko no mikoto, Okuni Mitama no mikoto, or Amenomikumari no Kami, Kuninomikumari no Kami.
sen.cmt: deity→deities複数に修正しました。is→wereに修正しました。Hayaakitsu Hiko no mikoto→母音が重なっているのでHaya Akitsuhiko no mikotoに変更しました。Okuni Mitama no Mikoto→上に合わせMikotoをmikotoに変更しました。
sen.e: The enshrined deities were Haya Akitsuhiko no mikoto, Okuni Mitama no mikoto, or Amenomikumari no Kami, Kuninomikumari no Kami.

sen.j: 闘鶏大山主 ...... 古墳時代の伝説上の人。
sen.e: Tsuge no Oyamanushi…a legendary person in the Kofun period (tumulus period)
Tsuge no Oyamanushi: He was a legendary person in the Kofun period (tumulus period).
sen.cmt: …→: に変更しました。He wasを追加しました。ピリオドを追加しました。
sen.e: Tsuge no Oyamanushi: He was a legendary person in the Kofun period (tumulus period).
A Kuni no Miyatsuko in the Nintoku period.
He was the Kuni no Miyatsuko in the Emperor Nintoku's era.
sen.cmt: He was the を追加しました。Nintoku period→Emperor Nintoku's eraに変更しました。
sen.e: He was the Kuni no Miyatsuko in the Emperor Nintoku's era.

sen.j: 氷室の氷を初めて御所に献上し、以後、氷室の管理者となった。
sen.e: He presented th ice from an icehouse to the Imperial Palace for the first time, and after this became the superintendent of the icehouse.
He presented the ice from an icehouse to the Imperial Palace for the first time and after this he became the superintendent of the icehouse.
sen.cmt: th→スペルミスです。Theheを追加しました。
sen.e: He presented the ice from an icehouse to the Imperial Palace for the first time and after this he became the superintendent of the icehouse.

sen.j: 闘鶏御田 ...... 猪名部御田とも。
sen.e: Tsuge no Mita…also called Inabe no Mita.
Tsuge no Mita: He was also called Inabe no Mita.
sen.cmt: …→: に変更しました。He wasを追加しました。
sen.e: Tsuge no Mita: He was also called Inabe no Mita.

sen.j: 古墳時代の伝説上の人。
sen.e: A legendary person in the Kofun period.
He was a legendary person in the Kofun period.
sen.cmt: He was を追加しました。
sen.e: He was a legendary person in the Kofun period.
A carpenter in the Yuryaku period.
He was a carpenter in the Emperor Yuryaku' era.
sen.cmt: He was を追加しました。Yuryaku period→Emperor Yuryaku' eraに変更しました。
sen.e: He was a carpenter in the Emperor Yuryaku' era.

sen.j: とびの達人で、楼閣上を走ること飛行するがごとくであったという。
sen.e: He was a master of construction, and it is said that he ran on the roof of the multistoried buildings as if he were flying.
He was a master of scaffolding builder, and it is said that he ran on the roof of multistoried buildings as if he were flying.
sen.cmt: constructionではあいまいなので、scaffolding builderに変更しました。
sen.e: He was a master of scaffolding builder, and it is said that he ran on the roof of multistoried buildings as if he were flying.
